name: Satin Lip Color Refillable Hydrating Lipstick
about: What it is:A rich refillable lipstick that delivers lasting, weightless color while blurring the appearance of vertical lip lines..Formulation Type:Lipstick.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Swertia Chirata Extract: Visibly blurs the appearance of vertical lip lines in as little as seven days..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This classic lipstick with a skincare twist contains concentrated active ingredients that impart creamy, long-lasting, and weightless color. It contains powerful botanicals that smooth the lips and deliver a fuller look, oil-dispersed hyaluronic acid that visibly plumps, and vitamin E that creates a soft and supple finish.
ingredients: -Swertia Chirata Extract: Visibly blurs the appearance of vertical lip lines in as little as seven days..-Oil-Dispersed Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps the lips..-Mustard Sprouts: Deliver a firmer, fuller look to the lips...Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Synthetic Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Isopropyl Palmitate, Silica, Swertia Chirata Extract, Brassica Alba Sprout Extract, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, C13-15 Alkane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lecithin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Cymbopogon Martini Herb Oil, Coriandrum Sativum (Coriander) Fruit Oil, Ethyl Vanillin, Pelargonium Graveolens Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Geraniol, Linalool, Citronellol, [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)]. ...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth across lips..-Apply more to build color and intensity if desired...Recycling Instructions:.-Place cap and carton in the recycling bin..-Discard base in the trash...Refill Product Instructions:.-Remove inner cartridge and clean out remaining product. .-Place new lipstick refill in base. Discard original lipstick insert in the trash and place refill carton and cap in recycling bin.

It didn't dry my lips at all either! The color enigmative is a beautiful warm pink. A nice everyday nude-pink color. I would love to see a wider range of wearable shades from this brand.

reviews.review_title: slides on ur lips like butter, so smooth

reviews.review_title: Demure - Color not as shown in pictures
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is made in Italy. The texture is creamy, non-drying and it feels like it hydrates the lips but has a matte/satin finish. The formula is great, although I am not sure it stays long on the lips. The reason I am giving this a 3 stars is because the Demure color is actually a dark/nude pink. The pictures online make it appear much lighter than it actually is. In fact, in some pictures it almost seems like a medium-light baby pink once applied on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely not a lipstick wearer, but I love Rose Inc so much I thought, why not! Gorgeous feeling. Rich, buildable color that melts onto the skin. If my lips are more dry, I can blot on the lipstick and tap it in with my fingers, too! I love the natural feeling finish. I love gloss days too but this is a new level of my-face-but-dressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini lipstick as a gift from Sephora and I love how persuasive looks on my medium skintone. The lipstick feels hydrating. I'm sensitive to some smells and I enjoy the smell of this lipstick. It's not too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color and consistency. Definitely a clean lipstick not a balm posing as a lipstick.  But, as it is not quite as emollient as a balm I used one as a base, blotted... applied Persuasive/warm rose satin, blotted and topped with a touch of gloss. Perfect!  more staying power than expected and enough intensity to take an everyday neutral rose to the next level.  I immediately ordered a full size after getting the mini as a beauty offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So incredibly creamy, it feels like a buttery balm on my lipsu2014soft and hydrating and it fuses with your natural lip color (but not harsh like a stain). So many lipsticks everywhere and most are a dime a dozen but this one is a true w
I got this as a beauty offer sample and found it to be very drying on my lips. The finish is very matte and made my lips feel weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick in the color Demure is my new absolute favorite. Itu2019s a very special pink shade. Also love the packaging, the slight vanilla scent, thatu2019s itu2019s made with clean ingredients and refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this lipstick!!! i have two colors and it is the most comfortable wearing lipstick ever. enough hydrating for my dry lips, but matte enough to be long lasting. i love the bullet it lets you line the lips perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s creamy and green. Which I like. The color was nice too. Downside it goes away in a blink and itu2019s too drying on the lips. Wouldnu2019t buy again.

reviews.review_title: Colour and texture description is misleadingu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Colour description on the website doesnu2019t match the actual lipstick. This lipstick is very drying and highlights all dry patches. For dry or ever so slightly flaky lips, this lipstick will make it look way worse.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, but the color description is misleading
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, truly creamy lipstick that doesn't leave my lips feeling gross once it's faded away. I really like the packaging too. Not sure how to refillable aspect works but I guess I'll find that out when I've finished it.  The only thing I'll say is that the color descriptions need to be changed. This is not a golden brown, it's a mix between mauve and a deep berry and can lean a bit peachy/coral sometimes. There's definitely no brown whatsoever.  I have light-medium skin tone and prefer brown toned lipsticks but I actually really enjoy this one. I've found that pairing it with a brown lip liner helps to create the depth that the description of the color states.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great every day shade especially for neutral East Asian skin tones (my skin tone), really pretty. Hydrating formula, doesnu2019t try out my lips

reviews.review_text: Very hydrating formula, glides on so smooth. Pretty color. However, Besotted is a bit darker (browner) than advertised. Wish they had lighter colors.

reviews.review_text: Perfect nude-pink for rosy/cool toned skin. I  always struggle with finding a good neutral/nude lipstick without it looking too peachy on my skin. This is the PERFECT nude pink. Easy application & long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating lipstick. I have really dry lips that cannot take most lipsticks as they usually end up looking patchy but this lipstick works just fine! It's hydrating and lasts a while. The eco-friendly packaging is a plus

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had a lipstick that has 1) lasted so long on my lips 2) has zero transfer. Absolutely not expecting to be so blown away by this. New holy grail. Will try more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Intuitive- ok color. Dry lipstick. Nice shine but lipstick bleeds and gets spotty quickly after application.

reviews.review_title: It's okay but not moisturizing for dry lips
reviews.review_text: I received my first Rosie Inc lipstick this morning and after wearing it for few hours I can say few things. First colour Intuitive, it pretty much matches its description and goes a bit on a darker shade. I watched some YouTube review videos for every colour under different light settings and that helped a lot. Now reason I gave it 3 stars is that considering it's CAD$37 price tag this lipstick is not all that it claims. If you have super dry lips like me this will not be moisturizing or hide any lines. I had to use my lip balm few times. It goes a bit more matte than creamy. Packaging is okay to me, no complaints there, it's very much Rosie's style. I do like the option of having refillable lipstick so you create less waste in the environment and it's clean beauty product. I'm still going to wear it combined with lip balm or lip gloss depending on the mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i thought this shade was going to be too light but it wasnt and it worked really well with the essence lip liner in the shade real!! the smell is also soo good, it smells like roses and marshmallows

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is gorgeous, and the formula is lovely - creamy but lightweight. It gives my lips a bit of a subtle sheen where I wear it.

reviews.review_title: My go-to, very flattering & comfy formula!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was never really a lipstick every day kind of person, then I found this lipstick.  This is my all time favorite lipstick, I literally wear it everyday, and it doesnu2019t get old.  The shade works so nicely with my skin tone and it feels nice and hydrating for my lips.  Some lipsticks are a bit too bright and feel distracting, they can also be drying, but this is none of those things for me.  It also lasts surprisingly long, and even though it fades a little bit after wearing for a bit, it still looks nice.  Another thing I like about it is that I can apply a light layer for just a touch of color, or I can apply a few layers for a more rich shadeu2014 I appreciate that itu2019s versatile in this way.  Last but not least, I am constantly receiving compliments when I wear this.  All in all, I absolutely love everything about this lipstick! ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy and reasonably long lasting lipstick. I love that this product is refillable. Not a lot of color selections in this line, but this is close to my natural lip color and great for a daytime, no-makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so hydrating and love the smell---it's very rosy. I got persuasive and its a great color for tan/indian skin

reviews.review_title: great solid lipstick with good ingredients
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always hard to find a good neutral for deeper complexions. I'm south asian with neutral undertone and the colour for me is MLBB, which is perfect.  Texture is lovely and staying power is pretty great too. I am a fan of the ingredients and love that it's a refillable bullet. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that the bullet casing feels cheap. Perhaps they're going for some kind of sustainable feel in using minimal plastic, and perhaps we have grown accustomed to thinking that heft = luxury. But, hey, for that price, and for its aim to be a luxury clean brand, I want some luxurious feel in packaging, even when sustainable.

reviews.review_title: For me, better than pillow talk.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a cool-toned mauve shade exactly right for me.  I was afraid it would end up the lighter purple hue on me like it did for some on Tik Tok.   This looks super dark in the tube, but it didn't translate that dark on lips.  Good pigment and staying power for my fair, cool toned skin. It will mix with other products and not end up a thick mess on lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark brown eyes and dark brown hair and olive/golden undertones. I get a decent tan, but not too dark because I wear spf daily. Itu2019s a pretty good color to go from summer to fall - which is why I purchased it.  It has a slightly sweet smelling scent which smells nice. I donu2019t mind it. If you are very sensitive to scents at all maybe this would work for you. It feels very comfortable on my lips and seems like it would wet nicely throughout the day and not looks crackly at all.   The one thing I really donu2019t like about this product is the packaging and the fact that it hardly has weight to it. Just to put it in perspective, Mac lipsticks are $19 and has a perfect weight to it.  Bummer, because I only really like to splurge for a lipstick if its also something cute and worth the splurge for lipstick these days because Iu2019m usually just wearing lip balms or lip oils and lip liner.   Itu2019s fully plastic of some sort and if it were to be refilled, I donu2019t think it would look very good at that point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipstick. Color is beautiful and not drying on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely formula, very pigmented and comfortable on the lips. The shade enigmatic is gorgeous. Perfect for fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i thought the poised color would be a darker shade, but it's really not a deep brick, definitely a brick color but not deep, still a nice formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found a Bobbi Brown Brown dupe that's clean, vegan, etc.  Wonderfully smooth, satiny texture with good color payoff. Lightweight and moisturizing. Has a floral-vanilla scent but it dissipates quickly. Would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I am not typically a fan of lipstick (i usually find them drying)u2014this lipstick is a gem. Its easy to put on and go (no worries about it seeping into wrinkles or outside of your lips). Its a beautiful color and so comfortable. I hope Rose Inc creates more colors and lip products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the shade Graceful which is described as a golden brown. I received the shade Graceful and itu2019s pink. Itu2019s neither golden nor brown. A definite return for me. I donu2019t wear pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to lipstick when I want something less glossy and more matte. Obviously this is technically a satin, but the finish once dried down leans more to the matte end. I have a hard time finding fuller coverage lipsticks that donu2019t seriously dry out my lips and feel very uncomfortable, not to mention wear badly throughout normal activities (talking, drinking, eating), but this fulfills all of my needs. Itu2019s not super hydrating, but it is hydrating enough that it feels very smooth on the lips without drying down uncomfortably. Itu2019s also really easy to put on without making a mess and having to clean it up, so itu2019s a great purse lipstick. The shape of the bullet is really great for filling in the Cupidu2019s bow with the flat end and swiping across the rest of the upper lip and bottom rip with the rounded end. I also love thatu2019s refillable, and the refills are decently cheaper too. All-in-all, really nice formula and packaging, I wouldnu2019t change anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time Iu2019ve ever returned a lipstick. The colour was not at all what I expected. It looks lovely in the tube but had a harsh almost bright pink finish on my lips, not the dark mauve I was hoping for. I think I need to swatch my colours in person rather than choose online. It has lovely packaging and a smooth application but I didnu2019t find it particularly moisturizing. To be fair I do have very dry lips. I wanted to love this but it was a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! I've bought 3: enigmatic, eloquent, and demure. Great shades and staying power without making my lips dry. These are my new favorite lip sticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the consistency & how it wears. - light. but lots of color. Long-ish wearing not cakey at all, color was a little purple for me, but still like it over all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new lip color, the color collection is so beautiful and natural, and I often like to use it in tandem with a lip balm for a more subtle color pop during the daytime.  Really lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The finish and color of this lipstick are beautiful--it's a soft coral, exactly what I wanted. The satin description is perfect--more sheen than a matte, but not super creamy. It sits on the lips quite nicely, looks smooth, and doesn't emphasize lip lines. Since it isn't too thick and creamy, it also doesn't move around when you press your lips together.  However, for $30, it has some problems. This shade leaves a white ring around the inside of my lips after it fades, which looks gross and only really cheap lipsticks have ever done to me. It can be wiped away, but it happens even if I apply a gloss on top, so it's not a matter of my lips being dry at the end of the day (this actually leaves my lips in pretty good condition). It's not the end of the world, and I might still grab more shades since I love the finish (and this color) so much, but it does feel unacceptable for this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking online for new lipsticks, and I saw a lot of reviews for the Poised color, which I think would look good on my Olive/tan skintone!  I have never had a lipstick that could be refillable, so Iu2019m excited to try it out! Iu2019ll edit the review once I get it and try it on for a couple weeks :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite lipstick. Elloquent is a gorgeous plum. it's not bright at all on me, it's a soft raisin color.  Love the initial yummy scent. Wears well, lips feel soft all day. I almost didn't get this color because of reviews, I love deeper shades but its hard to find one that isn't too deep. this one is perfect. I can't wear bright colors because it's too much. I just had to say this is definitely not bright on medium olive skintone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with my own money and i am very impressed! These are smooth and feel good on! They last a good amount of time also. The case is beautiful. Not as heavy as youu2019d expect but still nice. Iu2019d highly recommend these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the beautiful color and texture. The color almost looks like my own lip color.  The texture is velvety but not drying your lips.  Also love the way magnetic lid snatches the lipstick cover.   I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My only complaint-in spite of the name-itu2019s not hydrating enough. But on the plus side of that, like a matte, it also stays in place. The color is pretty, neutral. For me, itu2019s a great lipstick to work in. It gives a polished, but natural-ish  look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this product by Rosie. It goes on great, long lasting, and smells nice. I will definitely repurchase when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rose Inc. kindly gifted me this lip product in the shade Persuasive to try! I really love how I can pat the color or provide more pigment if needed.   The warm rose of Persuasive is a my lips but better shade.  It honestly doesn't even feel that I am wearing lipstick - it is that lightweight! It has a slight vanilla scent on application, but it dissipates quickly.  Really enjoying this and I cannot wait to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am in love with the idea of refillable lipsticks! the packaging it always so beautiful and i never want to throw it away. now you just have to buy a lipstick refill! the actual product is creamy and moisturizing. you def need to reapply but feels so nice when you do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this rosy nude itu2019s my new favorite go to lipstick weather Iu2019m going grocery shopping or to the movies for date night it absolutely fabulous! The formula lasts on my lips and itu2019s really light weight Iu2019m also in love with this packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this satin lipstick. It's creamy and is easy to apply. Very Hydrating on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where has this been all my life?? This product is so lightweight and it feels like it's not even there. My lips look so hydrated and pretty. Also, the color is so buildable. There's so much variety with one lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled to find lipstick that is both moisturizing, compliments my skin, and long lasting. This is it! It's also buildable if I'm looking for a bolder look. I also love the chic packaging and the fact it's refillable is also a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm recently starting to ge back into wearing lipsticks so I really appreciate how light and comfortable this lipstick feels on the lips. It doesn't feel heavy at all and its buildable so it's perfect for days when I want a lighter wash of color. reviews.review_text: This Lipstick was sent complimentary by Rose Inc. I received the shade Poised and let me just say that this color is gorgeous in person. I love a good dark Lipstick and this one has become one of my favorites. It's very pigmented, glides on so smoothly, feels hydrating on my lips, the color is buildable, and has a beautiful satin finish. One of my favorite things about this Lipstick is that it's refillable! I'm hooked and I can't wait to try the rest of the shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this formula! So comfy on the lips while leaving a beautiful color behind. The packaging is perfection with the magnetic lid and so aesthetic looking. I will definitely purchase more of these beauties!

reviews.review_title: Good, but beware of actual colors...

I chose Besotted, and it is described as a beige pink, but it isn't pink at all. It's a straight brown and much darker than is depicted in the picture online. Overall, I really like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this lipstick. The texture is smooth and light, the color is gorgeous.This product glides on super easily, is very moisturizing. It is buildable so you can get quite a bit of colour if you want to. The formula is smooth, goes on well and is moisturizing. I will definitely be picking up more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

Iu2019m a makeup artist and Iu2019ve added them to my makeup kit so I was super excited to their lipstick and see how well it would work for me before adding it to my kit aswell. reviews.review_title: I want to try other colors as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful and definitely buildable.  The formula could definitely be more hydrating, but I don't find it particularly drying and it is very comfortable on the lips. Really like that they are refillable too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by rose inc. I have the shade besotted and itu2019s the perfect nude for my light skin tone. Right in the middle and Iu2019m obsessed. The formula is such a gorgeous buildable satin that really does look flawless on the lips. The packaging is weighted and easy to use. Love the magnetic closure. My only complaint is the shape of the bullet. Itu2019s squared off and makes a precise application more difficult. But with a liner itu2019s no big deal.

reviews.review_title: it looks very natural and glossy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this beautiful like beige pink shade lipstick, itu2019s super creamy and hydrating. I really love that Itu2019s subtle rose scented. My only other observation/recommendation would be that I expected to be creamier and more hydrating. For me, after a while of wearing it, it feels a little bit dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the satin finish of this lipstick. Itu2019s long lasting and so comfortable! Even after drinking from a cup color is left on your lips. The problem is the swatches donu2019t match the bullet colors at least for Poetic. It looked like a light peachy nude shade but on my lips itu2019s a medium coral pink, which isnu2019t what I wanted. If you line and fill in your lips with a cool or neutral nude pencil and then apply Poetic on top it looks lighter and more like the lip swatches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, Iu2019m impressed! I absolutely love how easy this refillable packaging is to take in and out. I also was blown away by how comfortable and creamy the lipstick is. It is a nice, buildable formula and is super hydrating. The shade Besotted is absolutely gorgeous and will definitely be a go-to shade for me. Overall, Iu2019m super impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this lipstick gifted by Rose Inc and I love it. My lip feels hydrated and soft after applying. I love the shade on my lip. It feels and looks amazing. It is easy to apply and has a satin smooth finish. I love the fact that it's refillable and easy to use the refill. Overall, worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So moisturizing on the lips! The color is nice and pigmented upon the first application but you can still build it up! Itu2019s comfortable to wear and it gives the lips a smooth appearance. The design makes it easy to apply at the inner corners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. The formula is so smooth and gives a full look. It is hydrating plus gives a beautiful tint. I love the sustainable approach of the refillable packing style. This is the perfect lipstick for an everyday minimal look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

My only complaint is that I wish the packaging felt more substantial, but I love that itu2019s refillable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this lipstick! From the color to the packaging to how well it works! The colors is stunning and itu2019s nice and sheen it also lasts a long time! I love the reusable packaging too. You can grab more shades and use the base to just add them! So unique and so good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the color of this lippie! I have the shade Persuasive. I do wish that this was a bit more hydrating but it is a super light weight formula which I like. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I've been wearing it all day long without reapplying for the past few days and it hasn't dried out my lips. It just gradually loses it's pigment throughout the day in the most natural looking way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I feel like it lasts and isnu2019t drying. It seems hydrating without being glossy. I also appreciate the sustainability of this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

Iu2019ll give it 4 stars but if the packaging breaks like I incision, I would give it 2 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT, need more ROSE INC
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I wish i can own a whole set, because it is really hard to pick a color from the collection. I defiantly wish to explore more ROSE INC product. I am impressed with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It's still a great product, and I cannot wait to try out more Rose Inc. products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off itu2019s very comfortable to wear. I forget that Iu2019m wearing it because itu2019s such a lightweight formula. I love the blurring effect  on my lips. The shade is a perfect match u2014 sheer at first but buildable without becoming too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

The color is perfect for my skin tone, the payoff is good (super buildable to get the right amount), and it doesnu2019t dry down on my lips. This makes my lips super plump and hydrated, actually. I will say the bullet itself isnu2019t super friendly, the shape of it makes it hard to get into the peaks of my lips without smudging or blurring. Hopefully I am able to wear that down to a point that makes sense for me.For the price itu2019s really nice, and I love that itu2019s kind of sustainable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my lips feel plumped and very hydrated every day. This is a perfect fit for my no-makeup make-up look.  I definitely will purchase more shades for summer. The formula feels weightless and I forget I'm wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

Itu2019s very lightweight and I love the color payoff even after wearing it for several hours throughout the day. Itu2019s also buildable as I often wear 2-3 layers on for a more intense color payoff. Would definitely recommend these lipsticks and Iu2019m looking forward to trying out new shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that you can refill the lipstick. The vibrancy of the color is unreal. I canu2019t wait to try all the colors. I absolutely love the one I have and how easily it applies. If youu2019re looking for the perfect lipstick get this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has now become my go to!  I love how itu2019s buildable and you can get either an intense look or a neutral look with this shade!  The formula of the lipstick is very weightless as if I have nothing on. This lipstick leaves my lips looking plump and feeling hydrated. It also glides on comfortably and my lip lines are blurred wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok first of all, I'm so impressed with the refillable packaging case. The case is magnetic and it is really easy to swap out the lip color into the case. It is also really light, making it easy to throw into your bag too.  This lipstick is so easy to apply onto the lips, it glides right over and even gives a slight blurring affect to the lip lines. This does not feel heavy at all even though it is a creamy formula.  Love this formula! The lipstick is buildable too, so if you want to go for a sheer look you can, or you can really build up the color. It is not as long lasting, but for how nice the formula feels on the lips, I don't mind reapplying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Persuasion - warm rose is such a perfect neutral shade (lighter than on the tube). Warm rose is the perfect description of this shade. A buttery, weightless,  buildable satin formula that glides on and helps blur the appearance of vertical lip lines. Thanks to ingredients such as swertia flower extract, hyaluronic acid, and squalane, lips feel plumped, and nourished. There's no distinguishable scent except for maybe, reminiscent of cocoa butter. Another great plus, is that it's refillable and has a magnetic cap. Love a clean brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade Enigmatic! It glided on so smooth. The formula is pigmented and comfortable. I love the ingredients meant to nourish and reduce lines in your lips as well as plump them. The component does feel really light and cheaply made. With it being a refillable component, I'm nervous how that will stand the test of time. But overall the formula and shade is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looooove this packaging! Super chic & the top is magnetic! The shade is a little warmer than it appeared in swatches, not sure if that is consistent with all shades or not though.m. I also thought this would be more sheer but itu2019s very pigmented. This product feels light weight on the lips & is long lasting. I also really like rose inc & their mission. Iu2019m really enjoying this lippie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is nice and creamy. I think itu2019s also nicely pigmented. I would say the color definitely leans more beige-peach on me as opposed to beige-pink (their description) so it wasnu2019t what I expected. The design of the packaging is stunning, but it fell short when it came to the feel of it. I thought it would be more weighted. It feels really light and cheap. I usually donu2019t mention packaging that often, but when the product is refillable, I expect the packaging to be more than subpar. Overall, I think the product is nice, but it doesnu2019t stand out from other lipsticks I own or have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The rose Inc satin lip color is so smooth and buttery, I was quite pleasantly surprised when putting it on for the first time. Enigmatic is such a pretty pink color that goes well with my skin tone. The slight plumping is great for my lips and the one swipe pigment is insane. I need more of these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lipstick ever !!   my favorite lipstick color ever is modesty in your cream collection!!  it looks so good on me!! It stays on really well. I absolutely love this lipstick i  Gifted by Rose inc

reviews.review_title: Love this lipstick but shade is much darker
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick but the shade is much darker than anticipated. I expected this to be more of a nude. I have fair skin and this pulls pretty dark on me (it looks much darker than advertised on the fair skin model). For shade comparison purposes, I also have 'Velvet Teddy' by Mac and putting both on my lips, they look identical (even though the Rose Inc swatches a bit lighter).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Enigmatic and love the color! It feels lightweight on the lips with some blur to it too. The refillable packaging is so fun and sleek, you can easily refill it and I love the magnetic closure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many things I love about this Lippie! It's incredible hydrating and really work great at smoothing abs plumping. I love how lightweight it is, super easy to wear and the color is buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed with this lipstick. For starters I love presentation and this packaging is gorgeous, the magnetic caps feels so luxe. The product is buildable which I love love love. You can go light or more bold depending on your preference. The formula is very smooth and feels comfortable on the lips without any bleeding or smudge. I got Enigmatic and its such a gorgeous color, it is a terracotta pink that is perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula took a while to apply evenly I had to warm it up on my skin first. I do not like the shape as much as regular pointed lipsticks. It makes it harder to get a precise application. It is not one of my favorite lipsticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect warm nude shade for me.  I love the pointed tip to get that precision when applying the lipstick without a lip liner.  It's really comfy to wear and I like the satin finish.  The only thing is it wears off easily, which I don't mind.  My thinner lips look plumper and I love that it contains skincare ingredients like Hyaluronic acid, squalane, and vitamin e.  Also appreciate the refillable container and separate refills.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this lipstick in two shades and i have been wearing them on rotation since I got my hands on these lip colors. The formula is weightless and they're so pigmented! Really like the aesthetic and magnetic top packaging too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is so comfortable and hydrating and smoothing! And you can really make this lipstick fully opaque or keep it sheer and either way youbwearbit the formula is still moisturizer and comfortable. It makes the lips look just soft. I love the creaminess of this lipstick. I really enjoy this packaging is refillable too to cut down in waste. I just wish the actual component was slightly more weighted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rose Inc is a new-to-me brand and I was sent the color Poised, which is vampier than I would normally wear - but it looked and felt amazing  The packaging was simple but elegant. The lipstick itself is buildable, which I love for a sheerer look, or build up for boldness - or layer for something a little different. My lips have some fine lines, they were still slightly visible, but there was some minor plumping and hydrating that made them much less noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited to have tried Rose Inc new lipsticks! I love the formula, it feels very comfortable on, non sticky and very buildable! It starts sheer, which can be great for everyday or built for a deeper shade. My lips feel hydrated and nicely plump. I LOVE the packaging and the fact that is refillable.  I can't wait to get other shades!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging and so elegant. I love how easy it is to apply the lipstick and it has such an amazing, lasting color. Itu2019s so creamy and my lips feel smooth and plump. It last for so long and I like that itu2019s buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love the formula and color of this lipstick. I also think that they nailed the refillable aspect of it. Itu2019s hydrating and blurring at the same time and the color is a gorgeous pinky peach. My one issue is the smell. It has a very strong soapy/perfumey/floral smell. Itu2019s extremely strong when you first put it on but I do find that it doesnu2019t linger for too long. I would love if it were unscented or had a vanilla scent, just anything thatu2019s more pleasant. I love the color and formula so much though. Iu2019d say if youu2019re sensitive to strong fragrances you might not like this very much, but again it doesnu2019t linger too much and the smell dissipates after about 5-10 minutes of wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has become my favorite! The shade Persuasive is the prettiest dusty rose,  it has the most lovely satin finish.  My lips look pillowy soft and the formula feels very comfortable.  I definitely want to check out more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Rose inc. This new lipsticks are so beautiful. Very creamy and subtle. Refillable which requires only buying one case and then you can own all the gorgeous shades and use the colors depending your mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the look of this lipstick and packaging. I got the color Persuasive and expected it to be a bit more 90s brown-rose. The color is closer to a reddish rose on my pale skin. The lipstick is buildable and hydrating but I do wish the packaging was more luxurious feeling for the price and the intention of it being reuasable. All in all, I recommend it for those who love the colors and want a buildable, hydrating lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry lips so Iu2019m usually skeptical but I love this formula!! Itu2019s incredibly hydrating, but still weightless and sooo buildable! I got literally so many compliments on the beautiful color too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan of this lipstick. I thought the packaging felt cheap and I was underwhelmed by the formula. I found it to be very difficult to apply. After I warmed it up, it did go on a lot easier and I did like the way it looked. The shade Besotted was very pretty, however due to the cons and nearly $30 price tag I would not recommend this lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the packaging on this lipstick. It's sturdy and beautiful. The formula was hydrating and non greasy. The pigmentation was also really good. You will need to re apply it every 3 to 4 hours as it's a Satin finish and will wear off with earing and drinking in between. Else it lasts upto 4 to 5 hours without much fading. As for the color, I was expecting it to be more warmer and brighter but it looks more like a nude pink on my lips with a tinge of terracota.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this lipstick after trying Rose Inc. Skin Tint,  and it did not disappoint! This lipstick formula is very comfortable and the color lasts for a long time.  It makes my lips feel hydrated throughout the day. The formula is so light that I forget I'm wearing lipstick.  The shade (enigmatic) is gorgeous! I think is one of those universal colors that looks good on everyone.  I also LOVE the packaging! Rose Inc. Is quickly becoming one of my favorite brands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how hydrating this lipstick is as well as such a lovely shade. It's a nice almost burnt orangey nude, not your typical pink- kind of reminds me of the Very Victoria by CT. The formula is super smooth and lightweight, kinda satin finish but also buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is fantastic! The lipstick itself has a warm and sweet vanilla-like scent which I loved, and it kind of filled in all the little cracks in my obviously dry lips. It definitely helped make them feel a bit more hydrated! The lipstick is also buildable, so it can lighter or darker depending on your mood. Super easy to apply and it barely felt like I had lipstick on! It has awesome long wear too! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has a beautiful creamy texture and rich pigment! I it is one of the most comfortable lipstick formulas I have ever tried! It feels so smooth, creamy, and hydrating on the lips. In one swipe, you get so much opaque pigment and the color creates a beautiful veil around your lips. It feels very thin on the lips and while it isnu2019t transfer-proof, itu2019s super comfortable for long term wear! I love the nude shade I have because it doesnu2019t wash my skin tone out and it looks so flattering! The shape of the bullet also hugs the lip shape perfectly for easy application. Iu2019m a huge fan!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful colour payoff, but not hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour payoff, but I'm disappointed in the lack of hydrating. This lipstick is not as drying as a normal matte lipstick would be, but it's marketed as a hydrating plumping lipstick that treats vertical lip lines! I don't feel this is hydrating enough for that. However, the colour payoff is great, and the light scent is unobtrusive!  The refillable case is a brilliant idea, and it makes me sad that I don't like this formula more than I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love lip products and fell in love with this one! I was super excited that this one in particular is a hydrating product! The color lasted all day and it had the perfect amount of pigmentation! I am looking forward to when I run out so I can use the refillable feature and help reduce waste!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to see this one because Iu2019m a huge fan of her blush and lip crayon. The textures are so unique and I like how comfortable this one is on the lips. A really great shade range for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Persuasive Warm Rose shade, itu2019s buildable and creamy and doesnu2019t dry my lips! I love the magnetic closure on the case and that itu2019s refillable! Thatu2019s so cool! The lipstick is highly pigmented and not sticky at all.  Highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips looked plumped and hydrated thanks to this lipstick! It felt comfortable wearing this lipstick and I also found the color to be very buildable! The formula made this lipstick easy to apply and it also felt weightless on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color matches perfectly with my skin tone. Itu2019s lightweight, buildable and I found that the longer itu2019s there the more natural it looks. I can use it for date nights or day time everyday look without it being u201ctoo muchu201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off this applies beautifully! It has a matte finish with sheen. Id say my lips feel plumped, moisturized, and lines are smoothed. The color I got Besotted is the perfect u201cmy lips but betteru201d color. It is a touch darker than the photo. The first day I wore I was asked multiple times what I was using and I love the refillable option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips look plump &  feel so hydrated after applying. I love that the formula is comfortable to wear & easy to apply! The best part is that my lip lines look blurred after applying which is my favorite part. The formula really feels weightless on my  lips! It being buildable is most important!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try these lipstick and let me tell you I'm so glad I did the formula is super comfortable and nice I love the fact that it is a refillable lipstick that is so nice!!! I loveee this color I need to get more

reviews.review_title: Really hydrating formula & I love the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color of this lipstick was buildable and I really enjoyed the formula - there were no additional fragrances which I loved.  It was very hydrating! The reduced packaging on this product is a plus.  It would be great to see more companies like Rose Inc use less plastic/materials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect lipstick for fall/winter season. The shade I got was Poised and itu2019s a burgundy shade that goes perfectly with my medium skin. Love the formula and the fact that it is refillable!Lovely Product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t recall the last time I fell this hard for a lipstick, but, my goodness, am I in love! Everything about this product is absolute perfection, from the sleek packaging to the incredible formula. I canu2019t get over how creamy, smooth and soft this leaves my lips. The color is rich, feels luxurious, is long-wearing, non-drying and plumping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is nice, I wouldnu2019t say itu2019s extraordinary but does have nice features. Itu2019s buildable, feels lightweight, comfortable formula and feel and itu2019s a refillable packaging with magnetic top. I like my shade and how it gives a semi matte finish which is nice for a lips but better finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to be able to try this out. The shade range is absolutely beautiful. The formula is very creamy and pigmented. It has a refillable tube with a magnetic top. I would definitely recommend and purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color payoff. This lipstick glides on effortlessly! It seriously feels like thereu2019s nothing on my lips which I love. Some lipsticks are so heavy but this one has such a gorgeous satin finish and stunning color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick was gifted by Rose Inc in exchange of my honest opinion. It is an amazing lipstick to hydrate the lips and make it look soft and supple. This lipstick is nicely pigmented and stays for long time too.

reviews.review_title: Refillable with more then one color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing more amazing then a refillable product. With this lipstick, once finished, youu2019ll be able to refill and if what ever shade you choose next. I absolutely loved Poised and gave me all the right vibes for a wonderful night out in maroon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is incredible. I love this so much. It's perfect for dry lips because it keeps them nice and hydrated. I love the packaging as well. I received this product from Rose Inc for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: All of their products are packaged beautifully, and this one is no exception. This is a lovely brownish-pink colour that I received. It's as though nothing is there. Although it's a satin finish, it won't last long. It's a bonus that it can be refilled.

reviews.review_title: The perfect brick color I was looking for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try Rose Inc Makeup and I had the opportunity to try Poised from there Satin lip collection. It's such a beautiful brick color and its buildable to the intensity you want to achieve.  The application is smooth without tugging. It's not extremely creamy it's the perfect consistency I like in a satin lipstick. My lips did not feel dry at all. They felt hydrated and plump. This lipstick exceeded my expectations. I love that this is a clean sustainable brand. Huge plus it's refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this lipstick in the shade Poised, it is a really great deep berry/brick tone. I like to apply a small amount to my lips and press it in so it becomes more of a stain. I find that the color lasts a really long time that way and because of the satin finish, it feels really lightweight and comfortable on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipstick leaves a plump effect post application and is very Hydrating.It gives a blurring effect on the lipline,and the formula is easy to wear.Its a refill pack and stays for a long time.Its smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They have a prettiest packaging on their products and this one is no different. I got the shade enigmatic and itu2019s a beautiful brownish pink. The formula feels weightless. Although it is not long lasting since itu2019s a satin finish. Itu2019s great that itu2019s refillable too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by Rose Inc but all thoughts and opinions are my own. I love rose Inc products, and this is no exception. The lipstick is really hydrating and pigmented as well. It has a beautiful satin finish. I want to order more for myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good clean cream bullet lipstick & this is no exception. First off, the packaging is gorgeous! I love the aesthetic & magnetic closure. Plus, itu2019s refillable! The scent is absolutely delicious! Some vanilla with a touch of citrus or floral to make it really special. I have dry lips & this feels nice & comfortable on & made my lips look great. The color is VERY buildable. The only reason Iu2019m removing a star is because the deep shade I received (Poised) doesnu2019t have the longevity of my other favorite cream lipsticks i.e. any Bite Beauty formula from that last 5 years. lol I really enjoy this product though & would love to try a nude shade next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love anything that Rose Inc. makes! Right from the serums, and now the most hydrating, refillable lipstick. I can't step out of the home without it! I have it in Persuasive, need to try all the other colors too! The formula is buildable and my lips love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose the shade warm rose and it is absolutely beautiful. I love how my lips are plumped and it keeps them hydrated. It glides on effortlessly and is not sticky at all. It is highly pigmented and gives the perfect color payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so pleased to try this new lipstick, the package is very clean and nice weight. I love that itu2019s refillable, and very easy tu interchange. I picked up u201cBesottedu201d which is a neutral pink, very nude and deep. Also beside this is a Matte fu00f3rmula, itu2019s feels very comfortable. Iu2019m so pleased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got the satin lipcolor lipstick gifted by Rose Inc and I must say it is definitely going to become a new staple in my makeup routine! My lips felt so plump and hydrated after applying and I even forgot that I was wearing it for the day! I accidentally went to sleep with it on haha! It looks so natural and beautiful and feels amazing on the lips. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love !!! These lipsticks!!! Super comfy to wear & it keeps my lips hydrated through out the day. Very pigmented and glides on my lips ! The formula is amazing, Iu2019m in love . I definitely need all the colors !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really neat that this is a refillable lipstick! I love the idea of being able to change shades without needing a whole new tube! The color, persuasive, was beautiful on my lips and made them feel nice and smooth. The packaging was also super cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous product. The formula is nice - not too dry that it feels heavy or looks gross, but not so glossy that itu2019s sticky or unpleasant. The container itself is a bit light, so it doesnu2019t feel like itu2019ll last if I toss it in my purse. This is more delicate, so itu2019ll need to be properly taken care of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful and luxurious lipstick. Very u201cgrown upu201d and elegant packaging. I absolutely love the minimalist design and that it is refillable. Itu2019s very easy to take it out and insert a new bullet but once in itu2019s very sturdy. The lipstick itself is very creamy but not to the point you have too much product on your lips. The finish is satin and very natural looking. itu2019s very pigmented, hydrating and doesnu2019t feel drying. I also used it on my cheeks and eyes and loved it as well. Amazing AMAZING product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am enjoying this lipstick formula very much. It feels amazing on the lips and glides on without tugging with great color payoff. The packaging feels less luxe than others at the same price point but I am a big fan of the refillable component.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, rosy tone that works for darker skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Rose Inc. products so I had to try this new lipstick launch. I received the shade in Persuasive, and initially thought it might be too light. Turns out it is the perfect neutral pink for my skin tone. I can wear it without a lip liner, and pink blush and it looks so beautiful. Itu2019s a standard bullet lipstick formula that is creamy and a satin finish. It doesnu2019t move around too much but it does transfer. Overall, Iu2019d definitely be getting more shades because I like the formula and shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful and very buildable lipstick. Feels very comfortable on and seems to be pretty long lasting without feeling drying, it remains looking very nice and hydrated.  My lip lines look blurred and my lips looks nice and plum, and the color is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed with this product. I feel like it is a much more hydrating lipstick formula than Iu2019m use to and give awesome color payoff without being too harsh. This is definitely a new go-to for me and want to try more shades asap!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this packaging is so incredibly light that it feels cheap. It's honestly a bit offensive for a $28 lipstick that is refillable, so you'd thing it would make sense to put a bit more effort into the packaging. The lipstick formula itself is quite good. It's not special though. It claims to fill in lip lines and I do not see that on myself. It's a very thin comfortable formula, not drying at all, and it smells nice. I do not like the shape of the lipstick either. It has square edges that make it hard to follow the curves of your lip line. It's hard to get pst the initial disappointment of the packaging for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything that Iu2019ve tried from Rose Inc. so I was definitely interested in giving this one a try. Firstly, I love the chic packaging but this is with everything from the brand Iu2019ve tried! The formula is so hydrating, def will be adding it into the rotation.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, bold, buildable and long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary of Rose Inc. I have the color in deep brick and it is incredibly beautiful on the lips. It is easy to apply, moisturizing and helped blur the lips. The color itself is quite opaque and buildable. you can wear it as a light wash of color or as layered as you want. Overall I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip color, feels so luxurious and creamy! Absolutely stunning shade with great ingredients and the brilliant refillable concept! Highly recommend if you are looking for a comfortable lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is really creamy and pigmented, and wears nicely on the lips. I was able to build it up quite a bit without it feeling too heavy, and although it definitely transfers, it also lasts for a decent amount of time. Overall, I was very pleased with how this felt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice lipstick, and while the formula is nothing revolutionary, it goes on smooth and pigmented, wears nice, and smells like vanilla. However, my favorite part of it is the packaging. It feels luxurious, looks super cute, and even has a magnetic closure, but my favorite part is that it's refillable, I love being able to be more eco-conscious with my makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick feels very comfortable on my lips and works great for everyday wear. It's creamy and pigmented, but when I apply a thin layer or tap it on with my fingertips, I feel like the lip lines look blurred, and it honestly feels like there's nothing on my lips. Most of the time I forget that I even used lipstick in the morning! Also, the formula is buildable, and the more I add, the more vibrant the color becomes. It doesn't dry out my lips either. I loved Rosie's lip crayons, and this lipstick didn't disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish the lipstick did not have square edges as it makes application harder however I love how smoothing it is and the color (poised). The lipstick also blurs some lines on your lips and moisturizes pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love my Persuasive shade that I got, itu2019s perfect for every day, office or shop run. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade u201cPoisedu201d, which is described as a brick red. I am very pleased with the color. Itu2019s rich but not too deep, warmer and lively and yet makes a bold statement.  Application is surprisingly easy with this lipstick. I wasnu2019t sure given the somewhat unique shape (although Besame also has a similar shape, I guess itu2019s just less common). But it was incredibly easy to apply neatly and to build the coverage. I would say I did roughly two coats to achieve the full pigment that I desired. After applying, the lipstick snaps shut with a pretty rad twist. No, thatu2019s not a metaphor - literally a twist - the cap rotates to close in the correct position. Iu2019m not sure I can accurately describe it, but youu2019re likely to find yourself going, u201coh SNAP!u201d as you watch it happen!  As for the formula, it claims to hydrate and plump lips. I think the word u201cplumpu201d can be confusing; this isnu2019t a lip u201cplumperu201d in the sense that it makes your lips look larger. Instead, what I did observe with my own eyes, is that this formula deeply hydrated my lips through the day. I felt like my lips looked better 30 minutes in vs immediately after applying (!!) As a result, my lip lines looked as if they had been softened. Thus itu2019s another case of plumping=subtle decrease of lip lines. I want to be clear that if you purchase this for making your whole lips look larger, I think you will be disappointed.  Overall, for me this was truly a pleasant surprise! If youu2019re looking for a formula that improves the appearance of your lips WITHOUT sacrificing pigment - this is worth trying.
